homepage.presentation: Hello and welcome to my portfolio. Former ambulance driver, I have just completed my professional retraining and am now a web developer.
homepage.curriculum: I have pursued two training programs with the National School of Computer Science.
homepage.keen: Passionate about various web technologies and their applications, I successfully completed my training as a web and mobile web developer at ENI in December 2022.
homepage.opportunity: I had the opportunity to complete two internships during my training.
homepage.firstIntership1: The first internship, lasting for 3 weeks, took place at .
homepage.firstIntership2: During this time, I contributed to the creation of a Quiz application designed for escape room venues, utilizing technologies such as Vue.js, Node.js, Docker, and MongoDb.
homepage.secondIntership1: My second internship, spanning a duration of 2 months, was hosted at
homepage.secondIntership2: Throughout this period, I continued the development of their ERP using PHP and Symfony.
homepage.workStudy1: I continued with Quantior in an
homepage.workStudy2: from December 2022 to July 2023 and successfully earned my diploma as an Application Designer and Developer (Level 6 RNCP).
homepage.workStudy3: During this apprenticeship, I worked with technologies such as Angular, NestJs, Docker, and MySQL on the project aimed at developing Version 2 of Quantior's ERP. Additionally, I took charge of deploying the solution into production, including setting up an Apache server on Debian.
homepage.skill: During my training, I had the opportunity to enhance my skills in Java, PHP, Javascript, and SQL. I also learned about adhering to conventions and implementing design patterns.
homepage.sideProject: I also dedicated time to completing several personal projects. I developed an application tailored for climbers using Angular and Nest, as well as an application for hikers built on Symfony. Additionally, I created my first portfolio using Vue.js. Concurrently, I addressed requests from clients for the creation of their websites. In December 2022, I launched my inaugural website online, titled 'MetaHomeopathie', which you can explore among my achievements.
